channel.title: Black Screen Help
channel.description: I am using a 718 and i was really curious and i wondered what would happen if i do ::tele 10 -10 and what happened is it logged me out and now when i try to login my screen is stuck @ a empty black screen :/ Also tips are welcomed.

item.title: Black Screen Help
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

can someone guide me through this?

Read full topic

item.title: Black Screen Help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:4, topic:482422”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=600659.msg4217594#msg4217594 date=1360460849]

your character is nulled.

just delete your player char and log back in.

Or if you don’t want to delete everything you’ve ever done, just add a check on login. Then all characters will be automatically checked upon login to see if your player is in any coordinate less than 100. If they are, send them to lumbridge (3222 3222) or somewhere.
[/quote]
I don’t think its like that on a 718.[/quote]

Agh I worded that wrong. I tried fixing the sentence but then I focused on another part of it. The whole sentence is constructed in a weird manner…
I’ll reword it:

Create a check to see if the player is in any coordinates less than 100, and if they are, send them to lumbridge. Otherwise leave them alone.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Screen Help
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:3, topic:482422”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=600659.msg4217589#msg4217589 date=1360460580]
your character is nulled.

just delete your player char and log back in.
[/quote]

Or if you don’t want to delete everything you’ve ever done, just add a check on login. Then all characters will be automatically checked upon login to see if your player is in any coordinate less than 100. If they are, send them to lumbridge (3222 3222) or somewhere.[/quote]
I don’t think its like that on a 718.

Read full topic
